ai.question: Which three Layers of the OSI model make up the Application layer of the TCP/IP model? (Choose three.)
What protocol is used to transfer web pages from server to client?
Refer to the exhibit. Which term applies to a data transfer in the direction indicated by the arrow?
Which protocols use authentication and encryption to secure data traveling between client and server? (Choose two.)
Refer to the exhibit. What is the top-level domain of the URL shown?

ai.question: A network administrator is troubleshooting failed access to www.cisco.com. Typing the IP address of the web server into the browser successfully brings up the web page. What application layer protocol is responsible for the failure?
